markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Pulverizing Cascade](/Spells.aspx?ID=1055)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 10-foot radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You raise a pair of towering waves and slam them into each other, crushing creatures caught between them. Creatures in the area take 5d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 2d6.
name: Pulverizing Cascade

text: Pulverizing Cascade Source Secrets of Magic pg. 201 1.1 Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 10-foot radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder Saving Throw basic Reflex --- You raise a pair of towering waves and slam them into each other, crushing creatures caught between them. Creatures in the area take 5d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6.
